ing: 2 (15 ounce) cans black beans, rinsed and drained
2 green onions, chopped, or more to taste
2 cloves garlic, minced, or more to taste
ins: Combine black beans, tomatoes, coconut milk, vegetable broth, green onions, ginger, cumin, turmeric, and garlic in a large saucepan; bring to a boil. Reduce heat and simmer until desired consistency is reached, 30 to 45 minutes. Season with salt.
